name: vbox-mcp
description: MCP server for managing VirtualBox virtual machines with Windows Sandbox, Hyper-V, and security analysis capabilities
author: virtualization-mcp

prompts.name: list_vms_prompt
prompts.description: List all available VirtualBox virtual machines
prompts.template: List all available VirtualBox virtual machines

prompts.name: start_vm_prompt
prompts.description: Start a specific VirtualBox virtual machine
prompts.template: Start the VirtualBox virtual machine named {vm_name}

prompts.name: stop_vm_prompt
prompts.description: Stop a running VirtualBox virtual machine
prompts.template: Stop the VirtualBox virtual machine named {vm_name}

prompts.name: create_vm_prompt
prompts.description: Create a new VirtualBox virtual machine
prompts.template: Create a new VirtualBox virtual machine named {vm_name} with {ram_gb}GB RAM and {disk_gb}GB disk

prompts.name: delete_vm_prompt
prompts.template: Delete the VirtualBox virtual machine named {vm_name}

prompts.name: get_vm_info_prompt
prompts.description: Get information about a specific virtual machine
prompts.template: Get detailed information about the VirtualBox virtual machine named {vm_name}

prompts.name: take_vm_snapshot_prompt
prompts.description: Take a snapshot of a virtual machine
prompts.template: Take a snapshot of the VirtualBox virtual machine {vm_name} with name {snapshot_name} and description {description}

prompts.name: restore_vm_snapshot_prompt
prompts.description: Restore a virtual machine to a previous snapshot
prompts.template: Restore the VirtualBox virtual machine {vm_name} to the snapshot named {snapshot_name}

prompts.name: list_vm_snapshots_prompt
prompts.description: List all snapshots for a virtual machine
prompts.template: List all snapshots for the VirtualBox virtual machine named {vm_name}

prompts.name: delete_vm_snapshot_prompt
prompts.description: Delete a snapshot from a virtual machine
prompts.template: Delete the snapshot named {snapshot_name} from the VirtualBox virtual machine {vm_name}
